snippet: A group of New York City yellow taxi drivers, coached in recent weeks to produce a series of poems about their jobs, presented their work as part of the PEN World Voices Festival.
abstract: Group of New York City yellow cab drivers, coached to produce series of poems about their jobs, present their work as part of PEN World Voices Festival.
lead_paragraph: A group of New York City yellow taxi drivers, coached in recent weeks to produce a series of poems about their jobs, presented their work as part of the PEN World Voices Festival.

headline.seo: Cabbies’ Poetry Researched With the Meter Running
headline.main: Poetry of the Streets, Written by Those Who Know Them Best
